QuestData.Title: Okrilla's Revenge
QuestData.Description: The Dreadmaul ogres think they have bested us? They will all suffer. Here take this poison, place a couple drops in their rat stew.$b$bThe poison will slowly eat away at their insides. Causing a prolonged and painful death, just like they deserve.
QuestData.LogDescription: Poison the Dreadmaul ogre food supply.
QuestData.RewardText: I wish I could be there to watch their faces as they suffer. I hope they all die a slow horrible death.
